aboutUs.contactSupport: For questions or help using Makanat, contact
aboutUs.forGuest: A marketplace for Event organizers to browse, book, pay & message hosts online
aboutUs.forHost: A platform for Space owners to list, manage & rent their unitized spaces
aboutUs.subtitle: Makanat is on a mission to bring people together to meet, create, and celebrate. Our online marketplace makes it easier than ever to find and book unique spaces for any activity.
aboutUs.title: We connect people with unique spaces

becomeHost.about: Makanat platform is constructed to add their picture, so you know who you're talking to. Hosts and guests review each other after every booking, so people are held accountable
becomeHost.belongSubTitle:
Marketplace for arranging or offering lodging, primarily 
 homestays, or tourism experiences. The company does not own any 
 of the real estate listings, nor does it host events; it acts as 
 a broker, receiving commissions from each booking.
becomeHost.brief: Everyone from professional photographers and fitness experts, to companies need places to meet, create, and celebrate. Get your space in front of the most people searching for spaces like yours.
becomeHost.categoriesTitle:
Marketplace for arranging or offering lodging, primarily 
 homestays, or tourism experiences. The company does not own any 
 of the real estate listings, nor does it host events; it acts as 
 a broker, receiving commissions from each booking.
becomeHost.details: set your price, add photos and details, then your listing is ready to be seen by millions of people searching for space.
becomeHost.experienceBrief:
You love your space, so you control how you share it. Open your door to meetings during the week, dinners at night, or just film shoots on the weekends - whatever works best for you.
 Host receive 10 inquiries per month, on average, so you can choose what works for you.
becomeHost.guestMessage: Message with guests and accept bookings through Makanat. Once you confirm, your guests will receive information on how to get there and details like your wifi code.
becomeHost.howPaidAnswer: Through wire-transfer to your bank account. Makanat process payouts 3 days after guest check-out.

listAsute.text: Makanat marketplace sorts spaces to 3 categories, meeting, event and production. Space owners can choose to appear on one or all three categories, Each category can have different rate, discount offer and more.
listAsute.title: Select what activities to hold

listAsute.text: Space owners can not only rent their space through Makanat but also get to offer add-on services to be included in guest’s booking. We believe Host add-ons is a game changer to Makanat.
listAsute.title: Offer add-ons on checkout

listAsute.text: Four different policies to fit your type of hosting and help formalize all parties obligations using Makanat.
listAsute.title: Choose preferred cancellation policy

listAsute.text: To help reduce uncertainty, our hosts only receive already paid requests. This help on getting our cancellation policy to work properly and hold all parties accountable.
listAsute.title: Secure payments upon confirmation

listAsute.text: Upon host approval and confirmation of a booking, both guest and hosts will receive short term space rental agreement which includes booking details, host rules and cancellation policy.
listAsute.title: Auto-generated rental agreement

listAsute.text: As easy as it sounds. Download our app for more efficient communication.
listAsute.title: Message guests

listAsute.text: We provide income reporting and show you applicable VAT. In the near future we will share data with our hosts to help optimize the marketplace by hosting highly demanded activities and continue our quest to in generating value.
listAsute.title: Payouts and space income reporting

listAsute.text: We have answers to your questions, please visit our help center. If you couldn’t find a satisfying answer we are happy to answer any questions you may have. For immediate assistance, please click on the chat bubble in the lower right corner and one of our representatives will assist you.
listAsute.title: 24/7 care and support

becomeHost.listYourSpace: List your space & leave the promotion to us!
becomeHost.makanatInsuranceAnswer: Policy is under development to cover injuries and property damage during the space reservation period. Makanat users will be notified once insurance add-ons is released
becomeHost.payment: Guests are charged upfront through Makanat's secure payment system. Your payout is directly deposited after each booking, minus our 15% service fee
becomeHost.subtitle: Utilize your space by renting for meetings, events, and films or photo shoots
becomeHost.supportSubTitle: In the rare case something goes wrong, our support team is here to help. we're open every day of the year.
becomeHost.title: Earn money hosting with us!
becomeHost.whatAsuite: With a suite of tools, features and friendly interface. List and manage as many spaces who to welcome.
becomeHost.whatMakanatAgreementAnswer: An auto generated contract between space owner and event organizer sent to both parties upon host approval of request. MA includes, booking details, host rules, space cancellation policy and Makanat policy of use.

whoAnswer.subtitle1: Meeting rooms, Co-working/flexible spaces. Lecture halls and classrooms.
whoAnswer.subtitle2: Exhibition/gallery, conference hall, wedding hall, elegant outdoor spaces. or even homes!
whoAnswer.subtitle3: Video/audio production studios, and whatever space that can be used for cinematography.
whoAnswer.text: Anyone who owns or manages equipped space that can be publicly utilized for business activities, content creation or public and private events, can list their space and start earning today.

cancellationDeadlines.title: Calculating Cancellation Deadlines:

cancellationOptions.choose: Hosts must choose one of the following cancellation policies:
cancellationOptions.introduction: Since each space is of a different nature, so a single cancellation policy does not fit all Booking circumstances. Therefore, it is necessary to provide a spectrum of options to enable Hosts choose the policy that works best for their space and business.
cancellationOptions.optionFour: Guests may cancel their Booking until 30 days before the event start time and will receive a full refund (including all Fees) of their Booking Price. Guests may cancel their Booking between 30 days and 7 days before the event start time and receive a 50% refund (excluding Fees) of their Booking Price. Cancellations submitted less than 7 days before the Event start time are not refundable.
cancellationOptions.optionOne: Guests may cancel their Booking until 24 hours before the event start time and will receive a full refund for (include all Fees) of their Booking Price. Booking cancellations submitted less than 24 hours before the Event start time are not refundable.
cancellationOptions.optionThree: Guests may cancel their Booking until 30 days before the event start time and will receive a full refund (including all Fees) of their Booking Price. Guests may cancel their Booking between 30 days and 7 days before the event start time and receive a 50% refund (excluding Fees) of their Booking Price. Cancellations submitted less than 7 days before the Event start time are not refundable.
cancellationOptions.optionTwo: Guests may cancel their Booking until 7 days before the event start time and will receive a full refund (including all Fees) of their Booking Price. If Bookings is cancelled by Guests between 7 days and 48 hours before the event start time, Gusts will receive a 50% refund (excluding Fees) of their Booking Price. Booking cancellations submitted less than 48 hours before the Event start time are not refundable.
cancellationOptions.title: CANCELLATION POLICY CHOICES FOR HOSTS

confirmCancellation.content: A Booking is only officially cancelled once the Guest has received confirmation of the cancellation from Makanat.
confirmCancellation.title: Cancellation Confirmation:

generalConditions.sectionOne:
Makanat is designed to help all Services Providers to complete the Bookings with 
 convenient and efficient. Every Booking is a commitment by Space Provider (the “Host”) to make a Space available to an Event Organizer (“Guest”). When Guests cancel Bookings, the Host may lose the opportunity to have Space booked during that time. When Hosts cancel Bookings, Guests’ events and plans can be severely impacted Nonetheless, necessity may impose change in plans, requiring Guests or Hosts to cancel Bookings on occasion.
generalConditions.sectionThree: If any dispute arises as to the Cancellation Policy among the Services Providers and/or the User, the dispute shall be referred to Makanat for resolution and its decision shall be final and binding on both parties in the absence of manifest error or fraud. The parties shall provide and, as necessary, shall procure that any relevant third party shall provide, to Makanat, all informa6on, assistance and documents as Makanat reasonably require for the purpose of reaching a decision.
generalConditions.sectionTwo: All Bookings shall adhere to Grace Period as set out in the Makanat’s Cancellation Policy for providing a full refund for Bookings cancelled. To benefit from the full refund policy, the cancellation should be made within 24 hours from receipt of a Booking Confirmation but no later than 48 hours prior to the Event start time.
generalConditions.title: General Conditions

sectionOne.content: the case of cancellation by a Host, the Host may be responsible for costs, expenses, and other losses, and be subject to Fines. A Host agrees to be subject to the following penalties as a result of an unexcused Host-Initiated Cancellation:
sectionOne.pointOne: A Fine of 15% of the total price of the Booking as being space-displacement costs for Guests.
sectionOne.pointTwo: Delisting of the Host’s Space if the other Hosts, influenced by the behaviour of the Host, cancel multiple Bookings within a six-month period of the cancellation by the Host.

sectionTwo.content: A Booking is only officially cancelled once the Guest has received confirmation of the cancellation from Makanat. After submission, Makanat may allow or require up to 48 hours to finalize the cancellation.

multiDayBookings.content: For multi-day and nonconsecutive-day Bookings, the deadline for cancellation set forth in the applicable cancellation policy shall apply to Event start time for each day in which the Space is Booked.
multiDayBookings.title: Multi-Day Bookings:

aboutMakanat.description: A space marketplace for professionals, creatives and the public community to meet, create, and celebrate.
aboutMakanat.description2: With the unlimited non-lodging activities, Makanat spaces are sorted into three main categories :
aboutMakanat.efficiencyAndEase: With efficiency and ease
aboutMakanat.efficiencyAndEaseContent: Search, message, and book venues directly through Makanat where we’re available 24/7 to help you find the perfect space and answer all your questions.
aboutMakanat.enablingCommunitiesContent: Connecting professionals with spaces to work, offering creators with locations to manifest their ideas, and offering the public a unique gathering experience every time they want to meet, create, or celebrate.
aboutMakanat.forGuestsContent: A marketplace for Event organizers to browse, book, pay & message hosts online
aboutMakanat.forHostsContent: A platform for Space owners to list, manage & rent their unitized spaces
aboutMakanat.spacesPurposesContent: Marketplace for unique and beautiful spaces and put around you. Whether you need an event space, a photo studio, a conference room, or a party spot, we will help you to find the perfect location.
aboutMakanat.subtitle: It’s what we’ve been missing, for more connected and creative society. From professional photographers and fitness experts, to companies and individuals, Makanat is here to present you with new gathering experience!
aboutMakanat.title: What is Makanat?

gracePeriod.subtitle: All bookings are subject to Makanat’s Grace Period policy which provides a full refund for booking canceled within 24 hours from receipt of a booking Confirmation but no later than 48 hours prior to the Event start time.

content: Guests may cancel their booking until 24 hours before the event start time and will receive a full refund (include all Fees) of their booking Price.
policies.label: Very Flexible

content: Guests may cancel their booking until 7 days before the event start time and will receive a full refund (include all Fees) of their booking Price.
Guests may cancel their booking between 7 days and 24 hours before the event start time and receive a 50% refund (excluding Fees) of their booking Price
Booking cancellations submitted less than 24 hours before the Event start time are not refundable.
policies.label: Flexible

content: Guests may cancel their booking until 30 days before the event start time and will receive a full refund (include all Fees) of their booking Price.
Guests may cancel their booking between 30 days and 7 days before the event start time and receive a 50% refund (excluding Fees) of their booking Price
Cancellations submitted less than 7 days before the Event start time are not refundable.
policies.label: Standard 30 day

content: Guests may cancel their booking until 90 days before the event start time and will receive a full refund (include all Fees) of their booking Price.
Guests may cancel their booking between 90 days and 14 days before the event start time and receive a 50% refund (excluding Fees) of their booking Price
Cancellations submitted less than 14 days before the Event start time are not refundable.
policies.label: Standard 90 day

10Non-Compete.content: User covenants and agrees that it may not, directly or indirectly, compete with Makanat, or recruit, solicit, or induce, or attempt to recruit, solicit, or induce, any partner, employee, etc. of Makanat, even after the termination of all relations between the user and Makanat or the Services Providers.
10Non-Compete.title: 10. Non- Compete

11No-Circumvention.sectionOne: 11-1 User acknowledges and agrees that this Platform has been originally designed to facilitate booking transactions. Therefore, in no event shall any User, circumvent Makanat in order to transact with any services provider or another User it has met via Makanat to book an Event at a Space that is listed on the Platform.
11No-Circumvention.sectionTwo: 11-2 Makanat reserves the right to monitor all the activity on the Site or using the Services, including, without limitation, communications by and between Users and Services Providers, in order to monitor compliance with the foregoing non-circumvention requirements. If Makanat determines that any User is in violation of this Section, it reserves the right to immediately close his account with the Platform, deny his future access to the Platform, and remove any Space listings he may has on the Platform.
11No-Circumvention.title: 11- No-Circumvention

12GoverningLawJurisdiction.sectionOne: 12-1 The laws of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia shall govern all matters arising out of or relating to this Terms of Use and the transactions it contemplates including, without limitation, its interpretation, construction, validity, performance and enforcement.
12GoverningLawJurisdiction.sectionTwo: 12-2 The Parties consent to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia for any dispute, legal actions or proceedings arising out of or in connection with these Terms of Use (or the transactions it contemplates).
12GoverningLawJurisdiction.title: 12. Governing Law and Jurisdiction

13Severability.content: In the event that any of the provisions are held to be invalid or unenforceable in whole or in part, all other provisions shall nevertheless continue to be valid and enforceable.
13Severability.title: 13- Severability

14PrevailingLanguage.content: These Terms of Use have been made in English and Arabic Language. In case of discrepancies between the English and the Arabic version, the Arabic version shall prevail.
14PrevailingLanguage.title: 14- Prevailing Language

1Services.sectionOne: The purpose for creating this digital booking Platform is to help finding the perfect location for non-lodging activities with efficiency and ease.
1Services.sectionTwo: These services include providing Directories for Space Providers, Event Organizers, and other Services Providers (collectively will be referred as “Services Providers”). Makanat does not interfere in evaluating any Services Providers. The inclusion of any Services Provider on Makanat Platform in any way or in the directory does not imply recommendation or endorsement of such Services Provider its information. The Service Provider is solely responsible for the appropriateness and quality of the services they provide.
1Services.title: 1. Services

2NatureOfTermsOfUse.sectionOne: 2-1 The two parties agree that these Terms of Use , along with all the data which are to be generated, sent, received, or otherwise proceeded through this Platform, shall be considered as an electronic record generated by a computer system and does not require any physical or digital signatures.
2NatureOfTermsOfUse.sectionThree: 2-3 The User acknowledges and represents that data and information contained in this Platform are available for the purpose of help facilitating to find the perfect location for non-lodging activities with efficiency and ease, and shall not be considered by any means as a substitution for the Services Provider.
2NatureOfTermsOfUse.sectionTwo: 2-2 Makanat reserves the absolute right toadd, amend or update these Terms of Use at any time, and for any reason by posting the revised version of the Terms of Use the Platform. Such revised version shall become effective immediately after being posted on the Platform. The continued access or use of this application and any services contained therein as of the effective date of any such modification shall be deemed as acceptance to and abiding by the Terms of Use , as modified.
2NatureOfTermsOfUse.title: 2. Nature of the Terms of Use

3IndependentLegalRelationships.sectionOne: 3-1 User acknowledges and represents that all the Services Providers made available by the Platform are independent contractors, and their relations with Makanat are fully independent from Makanat’s relationship with the user. Therefore, Makanat may not be liable (impliedly or explicitly) for any loss or damages as a result of such services. The inclusion of any Services Provider on Makanat Platform in any way or in the directory does not imply recommendation or endorsement of such Services Provider its information. The Service Provider is solely responsible for the appropriateness and quality of the services they provide.
3IndependentLegalRelationships.sectionThree: 3-3 All the information of the directory including the information on the Services Providers are provided by the Services providers on “as-is” basis. the User shall exert his maximum care and diligence to ensure that such information are valid and correct.
3IndependentLegalRelationships.sectionTwo: 3-2 Any opinions, advice, or information expressed by any Service Provider are those of Services Providers alone and they do not reflect the opinions of Makanat. Makanat does not recommend or endorse any specific products, procedures, opinions, or other information that may be mentioned on Makanat Platform.
3IndependentLegalRelationships.title: 3. Independent Legal Relationships

4-1UserAccounts.sectionOne: 4-1-1 User is not obliged to register in order to visit the Platform. However, to access certain features of the services provided by Makanat, User will need to register with Makanat and create a User Account through an online registration process on the Platform.
4-1UserAccounts.sectionThree: 4-2-3 Your failure to maintain accurate, complete, and up-to-date Account information may result in your inability to access and use the Makanat Platform. You agree to maintain the security and secrecy of your Account username and password at all times. Unless otherwise permitted by Makanat in writing, you may only possess one Account.
4-1UserAccounts.sectionTwo: 4-2-2 User must provide Makanat with accurate and complete registration information. User must promptly notify Makanat if any of such information has changed.
4-1UserAccounts.title: 4-1 User Accounts

4-2RestrictionsUse.sectionOne: 4-2-1 Users of 18 years old who can fulfill its contractual obligations in accordance with United Arab Emirates Laws, may only have the right access to the Makanat Platform. You may not authorize third parties to use your Account, and you may not assign or otherwise transfer your Account to any other person or entity.

sectionTwo.content: 4-2-2 It is not permitted to use the Platform or its contents or information for any commercial or non-personal purpose (direct or indirect) or for any purpose that is illegal, unlawful or prohibited by the Terms of Use and public morals. Moreover, it is not permitted to modify, copy, distribute, transmit, display, perform, reproduce, publish, license, create derivative works from, transfer, or sell or re-sell any information, software, products, or services obtained from the Platform except with our prior written authorization. In addition, you particularly agree to:
sectionTwo.pointEight: Not to re-sell, use, copy, monitor display, download or reproduce any content or information, software, products or services available on the Platform or otherwise incorporate any part of the Platform into any other Platform without our prior written authorization from Makanat.
sectionTwo.pointFive: Not to disclose of materials shared, or dissemination of material that may infringe on the intellectual property rights of any person, or may be offensive or defamatory, or prohibited.
sectionTwo.pointFour: Not to transfer of any data that contain viruses, spyware or other malicious programs.
sectionTwo.pointOne: Not to broadcast any unauthorized promotional materials, or any other form of seduction ("spam").
sectionTwo.pointSeven: Not to tampering with data, information, and attempt to modify or destroy any security or documentary procedures.
sectionTwo.pointSix: Not to access, monitor or copy any content or information of the Site using any robot, spider, scraper or other automated means or any manual process for any purpose without our express prior written permission
sectionTwo.pointThree: Not to disclose any information and/or data and/or advertising and/or marketing of any product and/or incitement to an act or omission to act considered illegal by the sharia law and/or the law and/or public order and/or morals, including crime and/or breach.
sectionTwo.pointTwo: Not to use the Platform or its contents for any non-authorized commercial purpose.

4-2RestrictionsUse.title: 4-2 Restrictions on Use

5SpaceBooking.sectionOne: 5-1 Makanat will exert every effort to ensure that Users are provided confirmed Space Booking. However Makanat has no liability if such a booking is later cancelled by the Services Providers.

sectionTwo.content: 5-2 It is understood that Makanat is acting as a mere facilitator for digital booking platform, and therefore, Makanat is not responsible for any interactions between User and Service Provider. User understands and agrees that Makanat will not be liable for:
sectionTwo.pointOne: Any act or omission by the Services Provider or their respective staff;
sectionTwo.pointTwo: Cancellation or rescheduling of the booking, or otherwise.

5SpaceBooking.title: 5. Space Booking

6PricesPaymentTaxesRefundPolicy.sectionOne: 6-1 Prices and Payment: Makanat does not charge any fee for accessing, and browsing through the Platform. However, Makanat may collect payments from User on behalf of Services Providers. User agrees and acknowledges that he shall not hold Makanat responsible for any loss or damage caused during the process of collection of payments, or due to any acts or omission on the part of third parties or for any actions or omissions which are beyond the reasonable control of Makanat. Makanat reserves the right to modify the Prices without the need for any prior notice. The amended Prices will apply with immediate effect

sectionThree.content: 6-3 Refund Policy: In the event the services are not availed at the booking date and time, User may cancel the booking. Upon issuance of a valid cancellation by the Platform, the process of refund of your payment will be initiated in the same manner as the money was received.
sectionThree.pointFour: No refunds / cancellation requests shall be entertained in case of payment against Services received.
sectionThree.pointOne: in case of failure to utilize previous booking money for any re-booking cases, Makanat will initiate refund within expiry of twenty four (24) hours from the date of cancellation.
sectionThree.pointThree: Makanat shall not be responsible for any delays in credit to the Cardholder's credit card account/ accountholder’s bank account due to any reasons not attributable to gross negligence or will fulmisconduct by Makanat.
sectionThree.pointTwo: all refunds are processed with fourteen (14) working days from the date immediate refund is initiated at our end. You will be provided with the cancellation number to communicate with the Bank.

6PricesPaymentTaxesRefundPolicy.sectionTwo: 6-2 Taxes: All prices displayed on the Platform are not including the applicable taxes. Subject to the Laws of Saudi Arabia all imposed taxes shall be paid by the User in addition to the Prices.
6PricesPaymentTaxesRefundPolicy.title: 6. Prices, Payment and Taxes and Refund Policy

7IntellectualPropertyRights.sectionOne: 7-1 Any proprietary or intellectual property rights whatsoever, including without limitation, patents, copyright and design rights including any invention, design, discovery or improvement, computer program, documentation, confidential information, copyright work or other material which User conceives, discovers or creates during the performance of the Services (the "Intellectual Property Rights") shall belong absolutely to Makanat.

sectionTwo.content: 7-2 Unless stated otherwise, all intellectual property, including, but not limited to: copyright and content of symbols, trademarks, trade names and other information provided on the property on or via this Platform (whether text, images and other materials) are owned by Makanat. Makanat allows using material from this site only for personal use, subject to one or more of the following conditions.
sectionTwo.pointOne: It is prohibited to distribute or sell any part of this Platform for commercial or political purposes. The user shall not modify any part of this Platform.
sectionTwo.pointTwo: You must seek prior written approval of Makanat for any use of the intellectual property, or the information of this Platform, it is strictly prohibited to misuse any of its contents.

7IntellectualPropertyRights.title: 7-Intellectual Property Rights

8PrivacyUseData.sectionFour: 8-4 In particular, the User accepts on the following: (a) processing of his sensitive personal data; and b) the worldwide-transfer of the User personal data by Makanat to any third parties where disclosure to such third parties is required in the normal course of business or by applicable law.
8PrivacyUseData.sectionOne: 8-1 While we appreciate your interest in the Platform, we believe that your rights to ensure privacy are important. We will take all reasonable steps to ensure that your data have been properly stored by any regular emerging technologies.
8PrivacyUseData.sectionThree: 8-3 Makanat reserves the right to use or copy all data and information and/or materials submitted or sent from the user through the Platform (hereinafter referred to as the “materials”) Providing Makanat with such information shall be considered as an acceptance by the User that Makanat has the right to use and process such data for the purpose of providing the Services.
8PrivacyUseData.sectionTwo: 8-2 We keep and store personal data as long as it is necessary for the performance of the Services, provided that there is no legal obligation in the Saudi Arabia requires keeping the data for longer period of time.
8PrivacyUseData.title: 8. Privacy and Use of Data

9LimitationLiability.sectionOne: 9-1 While, Makanat will make reasonable efforts to ensure the accuracy and correctness of information, it does not guarantee, or make any assurances regarding the Platform and/or with respect to the information on it. The user will enter the Platform and use the information voluntarily and take responsibility for any risks that might occur as described in these conditions. User remains solely responsibility for evaluation and interpretation, as well as verification of information prior to use or rely
9LimitationLiability.sectionTwo: 9-2 You acknowledge and represent that Makanat does not accept liability for any loss or damage of any kind and in any way as a result of or in relation to the login or inability to gain access to this Platform, nor from the use of or reliance on any of the information contained on this Platform, including, but not limited to, viruses that can infect computer equipment, software or data, to the maximum extent of this responsibility being excluded under the law. Also , Makanat does not assume responsibility for damages resulting from the use of electronic means of communication, such as, but not limited to, damages caused by the delay, or the delivery of e-mails, failure, or interception or manipulation of electronic communications by third parties, or computer programs used to send electronic messages and viruses.
9LimitationLiability.title: 9. Limitation of Liability

introduction.sectionOneBold: PLEASE READ THESE TERMS OF USE CAREFULLY BEFORE ACCESSING OR USING THE MAKANAT PLATFORM. IF YOU DO NOT AGREE TO THESE TERMS OF USE, THEN YOU MUST STOP USING OR ACCESSING THE PLATFORM.
introduction.sectionOneNormal: (You will be referred to herein as “User” or “You” or any other pronoun that refers to the user).
introduction.sectionTwo: By browsing the Platform or accessing and using our Services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be legally bound by the Terms of Use of these Terms of Use and the Terms of Use of our Privacy Policy.
introduction.title: Introduction
